Html:
Hi folks!

I'm trying to figure out how can I collapse a range.
The only method I found was .setCollapsed(bool) in row/column dimension. but the doc on it does'nt help that much, and the code neither.
anyone already tried that?

The other solution is to duplicate the last line but duplicating the line style is not enougth...

any help will be much appreciated!
Ok. never mind, the collapse method that I was looking for was the "mergeCells" from the sheet object
